 ***calling all stargate fans pls read***

Hi i am a fellow starfate fan,i been lurking at this site for 2 weeks, i decided to join up today.

Well for all uk sky subscribers and none uk viewers, i have started a online petition against sky 1 for showing all the major shows in 4:3 than the original 16:9 format.

I have heard that stargate is filmed in 16:9, as well as Enterprise, and other shows. I believe shows should be shown in 16:9 image as we miss out on a lot of the picture.

Please voice your opinion at:

http://www.petitiononline.com/169/petition.html

P.S. this site is great, i cant belive i didnt come across it sooner. Annubis kicks ass.

well... widescreen rocks, but people have posted comments on the peitition saying "show it in widescreen or i'll cancel my subscription". i find this stupid. Sky has not said "we'll show these shows in widescreen".

infact, it probably costs them more to sign up these shows in widescreen. have you ever gone into a shop to buy a video? yes. have you ever noticed that the widescreen version of a film costs more than the pan and scan version?

the media is all about making money. i find the whole peition flawed, and i don't think that sky will change their minds. and those people who say "show it or i'll cancel my subscription" or just childish.

quote:
Found on the petition's main page
This SEVERELY affects the enjoyment of the above shows to their core fan bases as we know that this is not how the show SHOULD be seen


wtf? pan and scan does not SEVERELY effect the enjoyment of anything. Yes, you miss a little bit of the picture off from the screen. Big Wowzers! I don't think you're missing anything of importance.
